channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Dinosaurs Alive!; Being Babies: Two episodes.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Cat's Cafe; Cushion Den: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Staying Up Late; New TV: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle Is Not Well: King Thistle has a cold and needs medicine. Nanny Plum, Holly and Ben have fun collecting the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's Birthday: King Thistle does not want to get any older so decides that no one must celebrate his birthday. But all of the Little Kingdom has been waiting to celebrate.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs. Witch's Spring Clean: Ben, Holly and Nanny Plum help Mrs Witch have a bit of a clear-out. The children bring the magical items back home, but in the wrong hands they cause a few problems.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost Egg: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow. A tiny chick hatches from the egg and the children must find the mummy bird.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sailing Boat: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George sailing, but they keep getting stuck in the mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Masks: Madame Gazelle has got another task for the children; making masks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Molly Mole: It is Molly Mole's first day at school and she quickly makes best friends with Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Soft Play: It's Richard Rabbit's birthday party and George is invited, and that can only mean one thing; Soft Play.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Living Above the Shops; Roof Top Garden; Moving In; Everybody Sleepover!; Walking Bus; Happily Ever After; Singing Lesson; Singing Competition: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Moving In; Everybody Sleepover!; Walking Bus; Happily Ever After; Singing Lesson; Singing Competition: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Super Thinkers!: Gabby, Pandy and Carlita attend DJ Catnip's Super Thinker Camp, where they tackle the puzzles and obstacles so they can earn their rainbow capes and become Super Thinkers. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Taylor reveals its his birthday, but how can his friends make it special when they had no idea? It's Burn's Night and Mrs Bird teaches Paddington about a rare creature called a Wild Haggis.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has an important job to do in 'Paddington's Earth Day Mission', then in 'Paddington's Special Spring Harvest Celebration', everyone enjoys bringing their own celebration along. (S3, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Who is Paddington's Special visitor that Jonathan and Judy have helped come from afar? // It's the last night of Hanukkah and Mr Gruber's Hanukkiah breaks before he can light the final candle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Living Above the Shops; Roof Top Garden; Moving In; Everybody Sleepover!; Walking Bus; Happily Ever After; Singing Lesson; Singing Competition: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Cuckoo Clock: Jake's family cuckoo clock is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups save the day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House: Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Windsor Ruby is missing in 'Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case!', then in 'Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe', the Browns set up a takeaway, but it's hard work! (S3, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A game between England and Peru causes 'Paddington's Football Dilemma', then in 'Paddington Has To Say Goodbye', it's time for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still one more adventure. (S3, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing in 'Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar', then in 'Pups Save the Yoga Goats', Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing! (S6, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Travelling Travis finds a mysterious creature in troublein 'Pups Save a Humsquatch', and in 'Pups Save a Far Flung Flying Disc', a robo-toy causes mayhem, but Ryder knows just who to call! (S6, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora is shrunk by Big Red Chicken's magic in 'Little Dora's Big Adventure', then in 'Bye Bye Balloon', Dora and Boots help get Benny's Balloon under control. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger steals Farmer Al's super-powered seeds in 'Pups Plus a Plucky Chicken', then in 'Pups Save a Pet Show', there's a pet show where owners and their pets dress in matching outfits. (S11, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Papa Smurf accidentally gives Baby Smurf a growth potion in 'Big Baby', then in 'Don't Smurf a Sound', Gargamel gives Azrael supersonic ears and suddenly, the Smurfs can't make a noise. (S4, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Googly Eyes: Gabby receives a jar of googly eyes that comes with a warning: \"Don't shake the jar of googly eyes or you'll be in for a troublemaking surprise.\" (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Space Mission Blaze: When three of Blaze's friends get launched into outer space on out-of-control jetpacks, Astronauts Blaze and AJ must blast off to save them! (S8, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Liberty brings a bear into town in 'Liberty Makes a New Friend', then in 'Pups Save the Pup Pup Boogie Contest', Francois' hot-air balloon goes out of control before the big contest. (S9, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Rubble's cousin visits Adventure Bay in 'Charger Visits the Pups', and then in 'Pups Save a Shiny Ride', Mayor Humdinger hatches a plan to sabotage a contest. (S9, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Detective Potato: When Daddy's car goes missing it's up to Detective Potato to find it. (S5, ep 38).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Holiday: Peppa and her family have gone on holiday, staying in a teeny tiny little holiday home near the beach. They discover that even when it rains, they can have lots of fun.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Lifeboat; The Perfect Day: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Charity Shop; Bat and Ball: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Please and Thank You; Potty Training: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben's Birthday Card: Holly forgets Ben's birthday, and rushes home to make him a birthday card. But Nanny has stopped all magic, so Holly has to make the card herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Party: It's the twins' birthday party and chaos ensues when their little friends arrive. The Wise Old Elf tries to entertain them, but they turn him into a mouse.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston is Lost: Ben and Holly want to play with Gaston the ladybird but he is missing. Nanny Plum uses her magic crystal ball to find him, and discover his daily routine is not what they thought.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston's Visit: Gaston catches a cold when his cave has a leaky roof, so Holly invites him to stay at the Little Castle until it is fixed. But soon Gaston is taking over.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Submarine: Ben and Holly set out to rescue Redbeard the Elf Pirate's sunken treasure. Mr Elf steers the Elf Submarine to the bottom of the lake, but then they are gobbled up by Big Bad Barry.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Redbeard's Rainbow: Rainbows are a pirate's best friend - if you're looking for a pot of gold. But, if like Captain Squid you are hiding treasure, then rainbows are a pirate's worst enemy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Ladybird is up to her old tricks, but the Mighty Twins have a trick of their own in 'Pups and the Big Twin Trick', and in 'Pups Save the Mega Mayor', Mayor Humdinger gets super powers! (S6, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Abuela win the Great Abuela Cook-off in 'The Great Abuela Cookoff', and in 'Missing Map', Dora finds Map after a game of Hide-and-Seek. (S2, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: CatRat's Kitty Fish: Gabby unboxes a fishless fish tank and finds out it's for CatRat's four pet Kitty Fish! When they get loose, Gabby and Pandy join CatRat on a submarine adventure. (S3, ep 18).

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Sleepy Princess; The Library: Two episodes.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs Fig's Magic School: Despite protests from the Wise Old Elf, Ben accompanies Holly to her first day at magic school.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Giants in the Meadow: Lucy's dad is digging up the meadow and the Little Kingdom is in danger.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Farmer hires Yippy, Willow's plant, to watch over his crops in 'Farmer's New Pet', and then in 'Spider Smurf, Papa Smurf makes a revitalizing potion that turns him into a spider! (S4, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora is shrunk by Big Red Chicken's magic in 'Little Dora's Big Adventure', then in 'Bye Bye Balloon', Dora and Boots help get Benny's Balloon under control. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Paw Patrol must reunite an ostrich family in 'Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends', and in 'Pups Save a Fashion Show', after a puffy shirt floats away with Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger. (S9, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger gives Mayor Goodway a horrible present in 'Pups Save a Stinky Flower', and the pups meet a monkey astronaur in 'Pups Save a Monkey-Naut.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups dig tunnels for new books in 'The Crew Builds Library Treasure Tunnels', then in 'The Crew Builds a Super Snack Dispenser', Mix, Charger, and Wheeler surprise Rubble. (S2, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: School Bus Blaze!: Beep Beep! It's time for school in Axle City! But, when the students need help getting to school, it's up to Blaze to save the day by becoming. School Bus Blaze! (S7, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Midnight Mile: It may be nighttime in Axle City, but all the trucks are staying up super-late for the ultimate all-night race - the Midnight Mile! (S4, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Visiting The Marigolds: Everyone is visiting snooty King and Queen Marigold's Castle. King and Queen Marigold give them a tour, which is not without a few mishaps.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Fox Cubs: There is a new fox cub leader in The Little Kingdom - Nanny Plum. But whilst trying to earn their adventure badges the fox cubs find themselves stuck at the top of a mountain.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Please and Thank You; Potty Training: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Lots of Muddy Puddles: On a day out with her family, Peppa is encouraged to find words to describe the different kinds of puddles they find.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hoops: Peppa and her friends play some very active games in the gar-den and together they learn to hop, skip and jump.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Pirates Alex, Julia, Julius and Chick-arr-letta get lost in 'Pups Save the Land Pirates', then in 'Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots', a bird-watching contest leaves us up in the air. (S6, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta get trapped in 'Pups Save a Trophy', then in 'Pups Save the Wind Trekkers', Humdinger's mum Helga loses her son's phony trophy, and the Paw Patrol rescue her. (S9, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Indoor Adventure: A storm cancels Peppa and her family's adventure plans so they decide to take it inside. Using their imagination, they go sledding, climb a mountain and have a campfire in the attic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hot Dry Day: Peppa and George are playing in their pool. They help the garden animals cool down but when it rains, the animals are happy and so is Peppa. Rain makes muddy puddles for jumping in.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Folk Music Band; Calling Kylie: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Camping Out: Holly is going on a camping trip with Ben and his mum and dad, but they are soon joined by annoying Mr Gnome, who is always hungry and sings silly songs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Fruit Harvest: It is harvest day. The Elves and fairies enlist the help of Mr Gnome in picking blackberries. If only they could stop him from eating them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Games: Ben is in training for the elf games, Holly wants to join in but the rules state there is absolutely no flying or magic allowed. Ben gives Holly a chance to join in without using magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dinner Party: Snooty King and Queen Marigold invite themselves round for dinner to King and Queen Thistle's castle to sample Nanny Plum's cooking. Nanny tries hard to cook special modern food.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Market: Peppa and family find some great things to buy from the market and even get a special gift from Mr. Fox's stall.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Castle: Mummy and Daddy Pig take Peppa and George to a castle to feast on medieval banquets, play King and Queen and even meet a dragon. It's George's favourite day ever.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Parachute Jump: When the school roof is broken and needs fixing, Peppa volunteers Mummy Pig to do a parachute jump to raise money. Daddy Pig goes up too and has to overcome his fear of heights.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Gerald Giraffe: Gerald Giraffe is new to playgroup! He's trying to make friends with Peppa and the group, but finds being so tall is making playing hide and seek quite a challenge.

channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr Curry is sure there's a monster in the park lake in 'Paddington and the Lake Monster', and in 'Paddington's Space Radio', Toq wants to let her dad know she's thinking of him up in space. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Things go missing in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington's Journey into a Black Hole', then in 'Paddington's Rainbow Race!', Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of rainbow. (S3, ep 4).

channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.desc: Pups Save a Frozen Camp-Out: Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Paddington builds a robot in 'Paddington Meets PaddingTron', then in 'Paddington's First Diwali', Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has a race against time in 'Paddington and the Solar Eclipse', then in 'Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor', Simi receives an inventor's award, but why does she feel sad? (S3, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: A storm drops hailstones that hatch into baby space rocks in 'Pups Save the Baby Space Rocks', and in 'Pups Save the Eddies and Emmys', a 3D printer leads to pranks all over Adventure Bay. (S9, ep 25).

channel.desc: Water Park: Peppa and her family are going to the Water Park. Miss Rabbit is in charge. There are lots of fun things to do at the water park but first you need to put on your swimsuit.

channel.desc: Books: Queen Thistle reads the children a story, which inspires a question. They can't find the answer in the magic books in the castle, so go instead to the Wise Old Elf in the Great Elf Library.

channel.desc: Chickens Ride West: King Thistle wants a boiled egg for his breakfast, so the elves decide to deliver the King the chickens from the Elf Farm so he can have an egg whenever he likes.

channel.desc: Trip To The Seaside: Holly joins Ben and his family on a trip to the seaside, and Mr Elf tells her that no magic is to be used. But when no one has remembered to pack lunch, they ask Holly to help.

channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties in 'Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties', and in 'Pups Save Helo Humdinger', Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions. (S9, ep 17).

channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Ryder and the Pups need to help get a surprise cake up to Jake's cabin in 'Pups Save Jake's Cake', then in 'Pups Save a Wild Ride', Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge.

channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: Grandpa has a pink problem at the hair salon in 'The Crew Builds a Hair Salon', then in 'The Crew Builds a Colourful Crystal Show', Lily makes a shiny discovery. (S2, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Deep Sea Grand Prix: Blaze and AJ are racing under the ocean! Blaze transforms into a submarine and speeds through ships and coral reefs to reach the giant sand castle at the finish line! (S5, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben's Birthday Card: Holly forgets Ben's birthday, and rushes home to make him a birthday card. But Nanny has stopped all magic, so Holly has to make the card herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Party: It's the twins' birthday party and chaos ensues when their little friends arrive. The Wise Old Elf tries to entertain them, but they turn him into a mouse.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Ice Cream; Detective Club: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mandy Mouse: Mandy Mouse joins Peppa's playgroup. She uses a wheelchair and is super sporty. The children have a lot of fun playing together.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Park: Peppa Pig goes to the park to play with friends and have new experiences.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Ruff-Ruff Pack take a bus on a wild jump in 'Rescue at Twisty Top Mesa', and in 'Pups Save A Sneezy Chase', Chase's cat allergies lead him to the desert and he's trapped with the pack. (S7, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger hijacks Al's big rig in 'Pups Save the Swiped Stage', then in 'Pups Save the Big Big Pipes', Al's load of big pipes breaks loose. (S9, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clubhouse Takeaway: Suzy describes a takeaway and the children want to make their own. Together they 'cook' and deliver the pretend takeaways to the parents. They get great reviews too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walkie Talkies: Grandpa Pig has created a watering system, but he does not remember which button is which so Peppa and George help using walkie talkies. The Police hear their signal and are surprised.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Office; Little Swift: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: What Babies Do; Lenses: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Party Bus; Movie Night: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Uncle Gaston: Three baby ladybirds, Amber, Emerald and Keith have come to stay at Uncle Gaston's for the day. The baby ladybirds are exhausting! So Ben and Holly help Gaston to keep them entertained.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum's Lesson: Nanny Plum is teaching the fairy girls some important fairy rules when she is blown away, trapped in a tree, dropped in a stream and covered in mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Woodpecker: King Thistle is bored and takes up the hobby of bird watching. Using his magic bird book, the King is pleased when another creature makes a nest in the Royal Castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Plumbing: The bath tap at the Little Castle is dripping, so the elf plumber is called. It's a bigger job than first expected, but with King and Queen Marigolds coming round, there's not much time.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Miss Rabbit's Taxi: Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and the family to Granny and Grandpa Pig's house to drop off their shopping off, but that's not the last trip of the day for her.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Playing Pretend: When Peppa's bike gets a flat tyre and needs fixing, Peppa and her friends have fun riding their imaginary bikes and jumping in pretend muddy puddles.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Scooters: Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to school on their scooters. He decides it would be faster to ride back and he discovers riding scooters is such fun. He shows Mummy Pig how fun it is.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Move To Music: Madame Gazelle is getting Peppa and her playgroup friends to dance to all different styles of music.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: What Babies Do; Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Dollhouse Dress Up Chest: Gabby and Pandy go on a dress-up adventure in the dollhouse, wearing different costumes to help the Gabby Cats get out of some sticky situations. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Something is making strange noises in 'Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery', and in 'Paddington and the Fossil Hunt', Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, but isn't having any luck. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington learns that seagulls love chips in 'Paddington vs the Seagulls', and in 'Paddington and the Light House', the lighthouse light is broken - can Paddington help save a boat at sea? (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks Captain Green Beard's loot in 'Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt', then in 'Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper', everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition! (S3, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save the Fizzy Pickles: Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to pop.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save the Butterflies: Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace? (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The beach is a mess until 'Paddington's Beach Clean Up', then in 'Paddington's Holiday Farewell', the summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends. (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A sudden avalanche hits in 'Pups Get Your Goat', then in 'Pups Save the Crop Circles', Farmer Al finds mysterious crop circles in his corn field, and calls on the Paw Patrol to help. (S11, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger steals Farmer Al's super-powered seeds in 'Pups Plus a Plucky Chicken', then in 'Pups Save a Pet Show', there's a pet show where owners and their pets dress in matching outfits. (S11, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora gets a birthday surprise in 'Dora's Birthday Surprise', then in 'Moonlight Fiesta', Dora helps La Luna save the Moonlight Fiesta. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Zuma and Hurricane get swept off the beach in 'Pups Save the Mountain Surfers', then in 'Pups Save Humdinger's Home Away From Home', Mayor Humdinger takes his kitties for a holiday. (S11, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Baby Smurf travels through time in 'Smurfily Gmurfy', and in 'Smurf T for Thief', someone has stolen the Blue Moon festival cake, and to find the culprit, Chef has to lead an investigation. (S4, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Carlita the Ice Cream Truck!: Gabby unboxes an attachment that turns Carlita into an Ice Cream Truck! The only problem is.there's no ice cream! (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Pit Crew Power: Blaze is racing with AJ and Gabby as his pit crew! But Crusher is also in the race, and he's determined to win. Can Blaze take home the trophy, or will Crusher pit-stop him? (S9, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger hijacks Al's big rig in 'Pups Save the Swiped Stage', then in 'Pups Save the Big Big Pipes', Al's load of big pipes breaks loose. (S9, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Paw Patrol searches for missing dancers in 'Pups Save a Flamingo Dancer', and in 'Pups Save a Mayor and Her Mini', Mayor Goodway and niece Julia get stuck on a runaway art installation. (S9, ep 21.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hippies: Peppa and George visit Granny and Grandpa's while Granny hosts a historical re-enactment of the 1960s with her friends.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Dinosaur Party!: Peppa and George have come to play at Granny and Grandpa's house. Everyone dresses as dinosaurs having lots of fun and a bit of a party.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sea Treasure; The Botanical Gardens: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Apple Tree; Lucky Hamper: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Science Museum; Clubhouse Adventure: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Betty Caterpillar: Ben and Holly meet a new friend, Betty Caterpillar, but she is sad that she can't join in their games because she can't fly.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Giants in the Meadow: Lucy's dad is digging up the meadow and the Little Kingdom is in danger.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Mermaid: Lucy and her dad are having a relaxing day boating on the lake. They fish out an old glittery mirror from the bottom of the lake, but it belongs to a mermaid who would like it back.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben's Birthday Card: Holly forgets Ben's birthday, and rushes home to make him a birthday card. But Nanny has stopped all magic, so Holly has to make the card herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Party: It's the twins' birthday party and chaos ensues when their little friends arrive. The Wise Old Elf tries to entertain them, but they turn him into a mouse.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston is Lost: Ben and Holly want to play with Gaston the ladybird but he is missing. Nanny Plum uses her magic crystal ball to find him, and discover his daily routine is not what they thought.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Chase and Chickaletta switch bodies in 'Pups Save a Freaky Pup-Day', and in 'Pups Save a Runaway Mayor', Mayor Humdinger creates robotic pants to cheat at the Amazing Athlete Contest. (S6, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Boots win the Rainforest Race in 'Rainforest Race', then in 'Bok Bok Birthday', Dora invites friends to Big Red Chicken's birthday party. (S2, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Carlita the Ice Cream Truck!: Gabby unboxes an attachment that turns Carlita into an Ice Cream Truck! The only problem is.there's no ice cream! (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Fancy Dress Party; Grandpa's Compost Heap: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Zoe Zebra the Postman's Daughter; Pedro The Cowboy: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Bedtime; Masks: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Captain Daddy Pig; Miss Rabbit's Taxi: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Visiting The Marigolds: Everyone is visiting snooty King and Queen Marigold's Castle. King and Queen Marigold give them a tour, which is not without a few mishaps.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Submarine: Ben and Holly set out to rescue Redbeard the Elf Pirate's sunken treasure. Mr Elf steers the Elf Submarine to the bottom of the lake, but then they are gobbled up by Big Bad Barry.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Storm and the Lost Talisman: Gargamel is looking for a talisman that will help him to find the Smurfies' village. Storm decides that she's going to get there before him. But it's a trap! (S4, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora gets a birthday surprise in 'Dora's Birthday Surprise', then in 'Moonlight Fiesta', Dora helps La Luna save the Moonlight Fiesta. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The pups reunite a baby caribou with his family in 'Pups Save a Baby Caribou', then in 'Pups Save Luke and His Luke-Alike', Luke Stars gets blown away in a tumbleweed. (S10, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Danny attempts a jump over Rattle Snake Canyon in 'Pups Save Daring Danny X', and then in 'Pups in a Fix', the Paw Patrol wows with a mid-air rescue.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups help Lily take a big leap in 'The Crew Builds a Gym', then in 'The Crew Puts On a Construction Show', the show must go on. Rubble & Crew style! (S2, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Garbage Truck Challenge: Blaze is competing in the ultimate trash-themed race, but Crusher is racing too, and he'll do anything to crush the competition. Who will come out on top? (S8, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Toy Trouble!: The Axle City toy store has an amazing machine that can make any toy you want! But when Crusher uses it, he makes giant toys that run amok! (S5, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston is Lost: Ben and Holly want to play with Gaston the ladybird but he is missing. Nanny Plum uses her magic crystal ball to find him, and discover his daily routine is not what they thought.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Books: Queen Thistle reads the children a story, which inspires a question. They can't find the answer in the magic books in the castle, so go instead to the Wise Old Elf in the Great Elf Library.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Science Museum; Clubhouse Adventure: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Miss Rabbit's Relaxation Class: Miss Rabbit persuades Mummy Pig to go to her relaxation class, but relaxing proves more difficult than expected.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mountain Climbing: Peppa and her friends learn about climbing from Grampy Rabbit at the climbing centre. Mummy Pig is worried about George when he gets scared of heights.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Uncle Otis takes a trip to a lost gold mine in 'Pups Save a Jungle Miner', then in 'Pups Save Uncle Otis From His Cabin', smart tech ends up trapping Uncle Otis and Mr. Wingnut indoors! (S7, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Goodway's gesture of goodwill gift grows out of control in 'Pups Save a Giant Plant', then in 'Pups Get Stuck', Metal mayhem ensues when Marshall's Fire Truck becomes mysteriously magnetized.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Art House Day: Granny Sheep and Suzy take Granny Pig and Peppa around Art House Day. After a day full of screen printing and silhouette miniatures, Granny Pig finds the perfect artwork. (S7, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wildflower Wood: Madame Gazelle and Mr Bull lead the children to the wildflower wood to learn all about flowers. The children enjoy identifying Wild Garlic, Bluebells and even an orchid! (S7, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games; Magic Trick: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick; Racquet Games: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roof Top Garden; Moving In: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Factory: The Elf Factory is deep down in the roots of The Great Elf Tree. It is almost Christmas time and the elves are busy making toys. Some magic saves the day when there is a problem.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum and the Wise Old Elf Swap Jobs For One Whole Day: Nanny Plum and The Wise Old Elf each think they work harder than the other. King Thistle commands them to swap for the day to find out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy & Poppy Go Bananas: Granny Thistle comes to visit and gives Daisy and Poppy a powerful magical wand. The children escape from the castle and. go bananas.
